meta.author: Abhishek Dukare
meta.description: A comprehensive tour of my full stack developer portfolio

steps.content: Hello! I am your personal assistant for this portfolio. I'm here to guide you through Abhishek Dukare's work as a Full Stack Developer. Let's get started!
At the top, you'll find the navigation bar. It's your command center to quickly jump to any section, whether you want to see skills, projects, or get in touch.
This is the hero section, the first thing visitors see. It features a brief introduction and direct links to Abhishek's LinkedIn and GitHub profiles for easy connection.
Allow me to introduce the developer. In the 'About Me' section, you can learn about Abhishek's passion for AI, Machine Learning, and his journey in building modern web applications.
If you're interested in the details, click this button to download the full resume. It contains a comprehensive history of his professional experience and education.
Abhishek has a wide range of technical skills. This section highlights his proficiency in both frontend and backend technologies, demonstrating his versatility as a developer.
Education is the foundation of his expertise. Here you can see his academic background, including an MBA in IT and a Bachelor's in Computer Applications.
Now, let's look at the work. This section showcases various projects that demonstrate his ability to solve real-world problems using code.
Experience matters. Here is a timeline of his professional journey, including his roles as a Software Engineer and Assessment Assistant.
Code speaks louder than words. This section displays live stats from his GitHub profile, showing his active contributions and the languages he uses most.
Thank you for taking this tour! If you'd like to collaborate or have any questions, please use this form to send a message directly. Have a great day!
